data.name: Case Files: The Beginning
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THE GAME:

David Slade Mysteries: Case Files is an episodic VR adventure series set in the gritty dark streets of Riverside, where David must solve gruesome and mysterious cases. These cases are told over the course of his career as a homicide detective for the RSPD. David must investigate, gather / document evidence, solve & survive. Are you up to the task?

OUT NOW on the Oculus Quest APP LAB, (Screenshots are from the Quest version) This will be ported to PCVR with enhanced visuals, real time lighting and much more!

FEATURES:

  • Tactical Training Mode (Beta) Unlimited Random generated levels against NPC AI, Save the hostages and survive!
  • Dark & Mysterious crimes for you to solve.
  • Full spoken dialogue.
  • Full cinematic sound track by renowned composer Michael Gordon Shapiro.
  • Rich & Detailed Environments.
  • Use your forensic tools to examine & collect crucial evidence.
  • Cinematic cut scenes.

Episode One: Apartment 202

David is on his way home when HQ sends him to an apartment complex, as the neighbors have been complaining about strange noises and a pungent odor coming from an apartment on the second floor, room 202. Once David arrives he is faced with the task of solving a crime decades in the making. This new murder puts him in the hot seat and will test his skills as a rookie detective.

Episode Two: Memories Of The Past

David Slade is a homicide detective, with his own dark & haunting past. When David's sister died 5 years prior, there were many strange circumstances surrounding her death, and too many unanswered questions. Today marks the 5th anniversary of her passing, and as usual he travels to visit his parents at the family farm, each year in this time of remembrance. Along the way David gets into car accident, stranded and injured he seeks help at a near by house. What happened next, he was completely unprepared for.

* If you would like to be kept up to date on future episode development, feel free to join me on my Discord server: https://discord.gg/ASdTQaJ

data.short_description: David Slade Mysteries is an adventure series set in the gritty dark streets of Riverside, where David must solve gruesome and mysterious cases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10+
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1660ti +
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS10+
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700 Or ATI Equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS10+
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700+ Or ATI Equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.0+
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700 Or ATI Equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.10+
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700+ Or ATI Equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: David Slade Mysteries is an ever expanding adventure series set in the gritty dark streets of River Side, where David must solve gruesome and mysterious cases. Memories Of The Past is the introduction chapter, introducing the series protagonist David Slade. And it does contain some graphics scenes including, violent crime scenes and content.
